sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,MID ,MER_TYPE ,MER_SYS_ID ,AGENT_SYS_ID ,MER_NAME ,SETTLE_DATE ,SUM_AMT ,PROFIT ,SUM_TRANS_FEE ,CREATE_TIME ,CLEAR_STATUS ,CLEAR_ORDER_ID ,FAILE_AMT ,BP_SERIAL_NUMBER ,COUNT_FEE FROM MER_PROFIT_STATICTIS WHERE 1=1 AND MER_PROFIT_STATICTIS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MID) =#mid#
(MER_TYPE) Like '%'||(#mer_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(AGENT_SYS_ID) =#agent_sys_id#
(MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUM_AMT) Like '%'||(#sum_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PROFIT) Like '%'||(#profit:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUM_TRANS_FEE) =#sum_trans_fee#
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#clear_order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FAILE_AMT) Like '%'||(#faile_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BP_SERIAL_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#bp_serial_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(COUNT_FEE) Like '%'||(#count_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM MER_PROFIT_STATICTIS WHERE 1=1 AND MER_PROFIT_STATICTIS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MID) =#mid#
(MER_TYPE) Like '%'||(#mer_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(AGENT_SYS_ID) =#agent_sys_id#
(MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETTLE_DATE) Like '%'||(#settle_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUM_AMT) Like '%'||(#sum_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PROFIT) Like '%'||(#profit:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUM_TRANS_FEE) =#sum_trans_fee#
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CLEAR_ORDER_ID) Like '%'||(#clear_order_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FAILE_AMT) Like '%'||(#faile_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BP_SERIAL_NUMBER) Like '%'||(#bp_serial_number:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(COUNT_FEE) Like '%'||(#count_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
